channel.title: It's over
channel.description: So Americans, as of August 31st, the war in Iraq is officially over. Personally I'm glad, as nothing was getting done, pretty much like Vietnam. Discuss thoughts.

item.title: It's over
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

[quote=“Javafire, post:28, topic:358098”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=454610.msg3329967#msg3329967 date=1283391659]
Technically, all Obama did was remove the combat troops. We’re not out there killing, but we’re just policing the area from suicide bombers and shit.
[/quote]
I wish Obama would open his eyes and fuck up Iran before they destroy us.

Obama…
He won’t lead our military
He takes offense at almost anything
He’ll tread on you
Black power…
Holy shit does that sound like the kkk? oh i’m sorry it’s just the new black panther movement…

The truth is we need to move on to Iran now that Iraq is done. Afghanistan is a lost cause.[/quote]

  1. It is hysterical about how ignorant people are towards Iran
  2. If anything, Iran would attack Israel.
  3. I am from Iran, kthxbai bitch

Read full topic

item.title: It's over
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“rawr i am scary, post:24, topic:358098”]We started, how about finish it?

All those men lost their lives for our country for absolutely nothing. Why did Obama do that? Just rush them and clean it up real quick THEN come back home…[/quote]
Your an idiot, You do realize the death count was super low compared to any of our other wars (Although I do know two people who were captured and tortured, only one of them was found alive. RIP - Byron). Also, it was not for “absolutely nothing” as you call it. If you look, the treaty says we will still have 50K soldiers over there, that is more than enough for that area.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Javafire wrote:

reyx7:

So Americans, as of August 31st, the war in Iraq is officially over. Personally I’m glad, as nothing was getting done, pretty much like Vietnam. Discuss thoughts.

bullshit, Iraq was important because Muslim extremists killed our citizens and destroyed our property, weapons of mass destruction were hidden in Siberia the evidence is overwhelming, plus Bush practically kept wwIII off our hands. Think and study these things i know them from alot of facts and a TON of people i have heard speak and through writings, Sean Hannity, Rush Limbaugh, Glenn Beck, Rusty Humphries, George Norri, ect…

item.title: It's over
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:19, topic:358098”][quote author=Frell link=topic=454610.msg3329491#msg3329491 date=1283372544]

Seriously. Im interested on how much you know, tell me what you think the cause was and what country you’re in.

I’m gonna be honest, I had no idea what the war was about. I just know that war is stupid. I live in Canada.

Well seeing as how you had no idea why the war started you may be excused for thinking it was stupid :P.

Our mission there was a partial success, but it took us too long.
[/quote]

The reason of the mission was to put the Iraqian government back into power, and to rebuild their army once again.

At first, it was to be believed they had nuclear weapons. But then we stayed for the above reason.[/quote]
It was believed to have WMD’s because Saddam threatened he had them, this was also not the only reason.

Read full topic
